List of available positive effects as follows. However, the characters level 91 and above will not be able to get them.
Available effects: Poem Horn / Drum Poem / Poem AuthorityPoem Guitar / Harp Poem / Poem LutesBattle Sonata / Sonata MovementSonata Relaxation.
You can also get one of the following effects to choose from: Harmony Guardian / Berserker / Mage.
